attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Samantha Orobator is a 20 year old female, who lived in South London after moving from Nigeria who was arrested in Laos on suspicion of smuggling heroine.  Her trial has been moved forward by over a year to next week despite the fact she is pregnant with a baby due in September.  We call on the Prime Minister to do all in his power to save her.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
